founders.name: Simon Grabowski
founders.bio_summary: Founded GetResponse after building a first autoresponder in 1997 to provide easy, affordable email marketing tools for businesses.

product_summary: Email marketing platform with autoresponders, automation flows, landing pages/websites, and built-in webinars to capture and nurture leads.
pricing: Free plan at $0 with 2,500 newsletter sends/month; Starter from $19/month for up to 1,000 subscribers; Marketer from $59/month; Creator from $69/month with ecommerce tools; Max enterprise plan custom, recently advertised starting around $1,099/month (StyleFactory review).

core_problem.statement: Built to deliver easy, affordable marketing tools after Grabowski created his own autoresponder to automate follow-ups for businesses that lacked simple email automation.

competition.name: Mailchimp
competition.reason_compared: Popular all-in-one email marketing platform targeting SMBs with templates and basic automation.

competition.name: ActiveCampaign
competition.reason_compared: Marketing automation and CRM platform used for complex email journeys and sales automation.

competition.name: Brevo (Sendinblue)
competition.reason_compared: Affordable email/SMS automation suite competing on price and transactional messaging.

user_validation.detail: Independent EmailToolTester review notes GetResponse serves more than 350,000 customers in 183 countries, indicating broad adoption.

market_background.insight: Global email marketing software market was valued at $1.38B in 2023 and is projected to reach $3.73B by 2032 (CAGR 11.8%).
